title: [Large-scale] Early Childhood Picky Eating Management Expert Training Program: PEaters Choice Module Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary child nutrition principles, healthcare system understanding, and public health education experience
context.additional_context: Practical customized education for medical professionals emphasizing real-time case analysis and interactive activities

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more physiological/psychological causes of picky eating in early childhood.
Learners can apply five evidence-based picky eating management strategies to real-world cases.
Learners can propose stress-reduction plans using three effective communication techniques during parent counseling.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
